Andere Aufenthaltserlaubnis i.S. des Auf: Other residence permit according to the law (AufenthaltsG)
Aufenthaltserlaubnis wg. des Krieges im: Residence permit according to Article 23 Para. 1 or according to Article 24 or according to Article 25 Para. 4, 1, Para. 4a, 4b or Para.5 (AufenthG) as a result of a war in their home country
Aufenthaltsgestattung zur Durchführung e: Temporary residence permit for the duration of the asylum proceedings
Datum und Unterschrift d. Antragstellers: Date and signature of the applicant
Fiktionsbescheinigung „gilt Aufenthalt a: Probationary certificate "residence is permitted" or "residence is valid"
Reasons for the current stay; if applicable reasons why it is not possible to return to my home country:
Klage eingereicht am ... ;bevollmächtigt: Claim filed on ...; lawyer holding power of attorney (name and address)
Zeitpunkt der letzten Einreise in die BR: Date of last entry into the Federal Republic of Germany
bevollmächtigter Rechtsanwalt (Name und: lawyer holding power of attorney (name and address)
frühere Aufenthalte in der BRD: Earlier stays in the Federal Republic of Germany
